introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.subtitle: Your guide to customizing Negomi for your server

overview.title: Overview
overview.text1: The Negomi Dashboard is your control center for customizing the bot's behavior in your Discord server. This guide will walk you through accessing the dashboard, navigating its interface, and configuring key settings to enhance your server experience.
overview.text2: Whether you want to set up automatic roles, temporary voice channels, or customize AI interactions, the dashboard makes it simple and intuitive.

step1.title: Log in with Discord
step1.description: Click the "Login" button in the top navigation bar and authenticate with your Discord account.

step2.title: Select your server
step2.description: Once logged in, you'll see a list of servers where you have admin permissions and where Negomi is present. Click on the server you want to manage.

step3.title: Navigate the server dashboard
step3.description: You'll be taken to the server overview page, where you can see statistics and access different settings categories from the sidebar.

tip.title: Tip
tip.text: If you don't see your server in the list, make sure Negomi is invited to your server and that you have administrator permissions.

main_dashboard.title: Main Dashboard
main_dashboard.description: The main dashboard provides an overview of your personal usage statistics with Negomi:
main_dashboard.item3: List of servers you can manage

server_settings.title: Server Settings
server_settings.description: After selecting a server, you'll access server-specific settings:

theme_customization.title: Theme Customization
theme_customization.text: Negomi offers extensive theme customization options to match your server's aesthetic. You can customize colors, appearance, and more through the Basic Settings section.

badge_color_customization.title: Badge Color Customization
badge_color_customization.description: Customize the colors of your badges to match your server's theme.

common.title: Common Badge Color
common.description: Set the color for common badges. Default: #ff1493

uncommon.title: Uncommon Badge Color
uncommon.description: Set the color for uncommon badges. Default: #00ffb9

rare.title: Rare Badge Color
rare.description: Set the color for rare badges. Default: #ff4500

epic.title: Epic Badge Color
epic.description: Set the color for epic badges. Default: #32cd32

legendary.title: Legendary Badge Color
legendary.description: Set the color for legendary badges. Default: #9400d3

note.title: Note
note.text: Badge color changes will affect how badges appear throughout your server, including in profile displays and achievement announcements.

auto_role.title: Auto-Role
auto_role.description: Automatically assign roles to users and bots when they join your server.
auto_role.item1: Set specific roles for humans and bots separately
auto_role.item2: Select multiple roles to be assigned

temp_voice.title: Temp Voice
temp_voice.description: Create temporary voice channels that users can customize.

ai_settings.title: AI Settings
ai_settings.description: Configure Negomi's AI responses in your server.
ai_settings.item1: Control which channels allow AI responses

custom_roles.title: Custom Roles
custom_roles.description: Allow users to create and manage their own roles.
custom_roles.item1: Control who can create custom roles
custom_roles.item2: Set limits on colors and hoisting

saving_changes.title: Saving & Applying Changes
saving_changes.text: When you make changes to settings, a save bar will appear at the bottom of the screen. Here's how to manage your changes:

save_changes.title: Save Changes
save_changes.description: Click the 'Save Changes' button to apply your new settings

revert_changes.title: Revert Changes
revert_changes.description: Click 'Revert' to undo your changes before saving

reset_to_default.title: Reset to Default
reset_to_default.description: Reset all settings to their default values

important.title: Important
important.text: Resetting to defaults cannot be undone. Make sure you really want to reset before confirming this action.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Negomi's documentation provides detailed information on all features and settings. You can access it from the dashboard or directly at [Negomi Docs](https://docs.negomi.xyz).
